creator: Melsoft Games
descriptionHtml:
Join more than 50 million coffee lovers around the world and unleash your entrepreneurial spirit in this FUN and RELAXING restaurant game. Decide on your cafe or restaurant business STRATEGY and earn income, even when you are offline!

RESTAURANT GAME SIMULATION
• With My Cafe you can own and grow a coffee shop or a restaurant of your dreams
• Decorate your coffee shop as you wish, hire and train staff, decide on cafe menu items and even set prices as you see fit

CAFE MAKEOVER
• Do you have a knack for design? Hone your interior design skills and do a total cafe or a restaurant makeover
• In this cooking game, you can choose from numerous decor styles, position furniture as you wish, and make a coffee shop totally yours by accentuating with elements that show your true self

INTERACTIVE STORYLINES IN YOUR CAFE
• As a true coffee shop owner, you will get to meet your customers from various backgrounds and get to help them navigate through life. In this restaurant game you can pick between different lines of dialogue with customers and see where your story takes you!
• Do you like drama? Romance? In My Cafe, the choice is all yours!

GO SOCIAL WITH MY CAFE
• Play my cafe with friends and meet like-minded coffee lovers to form townships and compete against owners of other coffee shops
• Fulfill festival tasks and lead your town to success together!

COFFEE AND CAFE MANIA: Do you love coffee as much as we do?
• Unleash your barista superpower and create custom coffee and tea drinks for all your guests
• Unlock unique coffee recipes and spice up everyone’s life in your cafe with distinctive coffee drink combinations

••••••••••••••••••••••
My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is FREE to download and play with no obligations to pay. However, some in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device’s settings
••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
descriptionShort: Build a trendy coffee shop or turn it into a restaurant of your dreams!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Join the Festival Marathon!
Marathon rewards go to both townships and the PLAYER

• It's Coffee Season! Win festival trophies and the Coffee Tree will bring you even more diamonds
Important: only trophies you earn personally will count
For players level 40+:
• Meet Michaela, your new customer
• New stories to reach level 41: "Upside Down" and "Agent Double-O-Ben"
• Apple Pie Display Case on level 41 with new recipes

title: My Cafe — Restaurant game

creator: Melsoft Games
descriptionHtml:
Join more than 50 million coffee lovers around the world and unleash your entrepreneurial spirit in this FUN and RELAXING restaurant game. Decide on your cafe or restaurant business STRATEGY and earn income, even when you are offline!

RESTAURANT GAME SIMULATION
• With My Cafe you can own and grow a coffee shop or a restaurant of your dreams
• Decorate your coffee shop as you wish, hire and train staff, decide on cafe menu items and even set prices as you see fit

CAFE MAKEOVER
• Do you have a knack for design? Hone your interior design skills and do a total cafe or a restaurant makeover
• In this cooking game, you can choose from numerous decor styles, position furniture as you wish, and make a coffee shop totally yours by accentuating with elements that show your true self

INTERACTIVE STORYLINES IN YOUR CAFE
• As a true coffee shop owner, you will get to meet your customers from various backgrounds and get to help them navigate through life. In this restaurant game you can pick between different lines of dialogue with customers and see where your story takes you!
• Do you like drama? Romance? In My Cafe, the choice is all yours!

GO SOCIAL WITH MY CAFE
• Play my cafe with friends and meet like-minded coffee lovers to form townships and compete against owners of other coffee shops
• Fulfill festival tasks and lead your town to success together!

COFFEE AND CAFE MANIA: Do you love coffee as much as we do?
• Unleash your barista superpower and create custom coffee and tea drinks for all your guests
• Unlock unique coffee recipes and spice up everyone’s life in your cafe with distinctive coffee drink combinations

••••••••••••••••••••••

Hello! In this update:
For players of level 8+:
• You've never had a trip to a museum like this before! Forged artworks, bona fide criminals, and Laura the archeologist who's trying to save her friend. Exchange candies for decorations in the store!
• A pajama party in an ancient castle—what could go wrong? Find out in the new adventure with Charlotte!
• Disco Season! Earn trophies in festivals, and the Disco Speaker will give you more diamonds
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself count

descriptionHtml:
Join more than 50 million coffee lovers around the world and unleash your entrepreneurial spirit in this FUN and RELAXING restaurant game. Decide on your cafe or restaurant business STRATEGY and earn income, even when you are offline!

RESTAURANT GAME SIMULATION
• With My Cafe you can own and grow a coffee shop or a restaurant of your dreams
• Decorate your coffee shop as you wish, hire and train staff, decide on cafe menu items and even set prices as you see fit

CAFE MAKEOVER
• Do you have a knack for design? Hone your interior design skills and do a total cafe or a restaurant makeover
• In this cooking game, you can choose from numerous decor styles, position furniture as you wish, and make a coffee shop totally yours by accentuating with elements that show your true self

INTERACTIVE STORYLINES IN YOUR CAFE
• As a true coffee shop owner, you will get to meet your customers from various backgrounds and get to help them navigate through life. In this restaurant game you can pick between different lines of dialogue with customers and see where your story takes you!
• Do you like drama? Romance? In My Cafe, the choice is all yours!

GO SOCIAL WITH MY CAFE
• Play my cafe with friends and meet like-minded coffee lovers to form townships and compete against owners of other coffee shops
• Fulfill festival tasks and lead your town to success together!

COFFEE AND CAFE MANIA: Do you love coffee as much as we do?
• Unleash your barista superpower and create custom coffee and tea drinks for all your guests
• Unlock unique coffee recipes and spice up everyone’s life in your cafe with distinctive coffee drink combinations

••••••••••••••••••••••
My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is FREE to download and play with no obligations to pay. However, some in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device’s settings
••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
descriptionShort: Build a trendy coffee shop or turn it into a restaurant of your dreams!

appDetails.developerAddress: 105, Agion Omologiton Avenue, 1080 Nicosia, Cyprus
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hello! In this update:
For players of level 8+:
• Go to spy college with Margaret. Uncover mysteries, collect candies, and exchange them for decorations at the Unique Items store!
• Help Chloe learn what it's like being a police officer. Chases, robberies, and secret missions are all waiting for you!
• Coffee Season! Earn trophies in festivals, and the Coffee Tree will give you more diamonds
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself count
More details on our social media. Have fun!

rated.label: PEGI 12
rated.learnMoreHtmlLink:
Sexual innuendo, Mild swearing

title: My Cafe — Restaurant management game & Recipes

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Join more than 50 million coffee lovers around the world and unleash your entrepreneurial spirit in this FUN and RELAXING restaurant game. Decide on your cafe or restaurant business STRATEGY and earn income, even when you are offline!

RESTAURANT GAME SIMULATION
• With My Cafe you can own and grow a coffee shop or a restaurant of your dreams
• Decorate your coffee shop as you wish, hire and train staff, decide on cafe menu items and even set prices as you see fit

CAFE MAKEOVER
• Do you have a knack for design? Hone your interior design skills and do a total cafe or a restaurant makeover
• In this cooking game, you can choose from numerous decor styles, position furniture as you wish, and make a coffee shop totally yours by accentuating with elements that show your true self

INTERACTIVE STORYLINES IN YOUR CAFE
• As a true coffee shop owner, you will get to meet your customers from various backgrounds and get to help them navigate through life. In this restaurant game you can pick between different lines of dialogue with customers and see where your story takes you!
• Do you like drama? Romance? In My Cafe, the choice is all yours!

GO SOCIAL WITH MY CAFE
• Play my cafe with friends and meet like-minded coffee lovers to form townships and compete against owners of other coffee shops
• Fulfill festival tasks and lead your town to success together!

Do you love coffee as much as we do?
• Unleash your barista superpower and create custom coffee and tea drinks for all your guests
• Unlock unique coffee recipes and spice up everyone’s life in your cafe with distinctive coffee drink combinations

••••••••••••••••••••••
My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is FREE to download and play with no obligations to pay. However, some in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device’s settings
••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

• With My Cafe you can own and grow a coffee shop or a restaurant of your dreams
• Decorate your coffee shop as you wish, hire and train staff, decide on cafe menu items and even set prices as you see fit

CAFE DECOR
• Do you have a knack for design? Hone your interior design skills!
• In this cooking game, you can choose from numerous decor styles, position furniture as you wish, and make a coffee shop totally yours by accentuating with elements that show your true self

INTERACTIVE STORYLINES IN YOUR CAFE
• As a true coffee shop owner, you will get to meet your customers from various backgrounds and get to help them navigate through life. In this restaurant game you can pick between different lines of dialogue with customers and see where your story takes you!
• Do you like drama? Romance? In My Cafe, the choice is all yours!

GO SOCIAL WITH MY CAFE
• Play my cafe with friends and meet like-minded coffee lovers to compete against owners of other coffee shops
• Fulfill festival tasks and lead your town to success together!

Do you love coffee as much as we do?
• Unleash your barista superpower and create custom coffee and tea drinks for all your guests
• Unlock unique coffee recipes and spice up everyone’s life in your cafe with distinctive coffee drink combinations

••••••••••••••••••••••
My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is FREE to download and play with no obligations to pay. However, some in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device’s settings
••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

title: My Cafe — Restaurant management game & Recipes

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to My Cafe — Restaurant Management ⭐, Tycoon Simulation 💰& Cooking Game 🍰.

Have you ever dreamed of opening your own profitable business and becoming a restaurant tycoon? Here everything is possible! My Cafe takes the best from business management and idle tycoon games with a good mix of cooking games.

Enjoy this exciting restaurant tycoon simulator & management game! Cook according to recipes and serve your customers delicious food and coffee, manage your restaurant, and decorate it with various aesthetically pleasing styles to attract more visitors to your cafe, earn profit along with enjoying an exciting storyline.

Intrigued? Let us tell you more about the game's features!

💰Manage restaurant and get profit
Reveal your business and restaurant management skills with My Cafe! Receive visitors in your cozy coffee shop, serve desserts, and earn coins. Use the coins you earn to buy equipment for your cafe and upgrade other items in your coffee shop. Everything is like in real life!

Added bonus: Even when you are not playing the game, the staff will complete orders for you and generate income for your cafe.

☕️ Cook and surprise your customers with delicious recipes
Do you like cooking? Сinnamon cupcakes, french coffee… Sounds tasty! Step by step you will discover new exciting recipes to delight your visitors. Take their orders, cook, and serve them delicious food and drinks.

🛋 Decorate your coffee shop
Show your design skills and decorate your coffee shop to your hearts’ desire with tons of gorgeous decor items to choose from. Pick and match furniture, wall color, and exterior decor to turn your cafe a bucket list visit.

👩‍💼 💬 Interact with your customers
Customers come to your coffee shop not just to eat - but to share interesting stories! Meet visitors and discover their unique life stories, develop true friendships, and share advice.
Love, mystery, relationships... All these and many more stories are intertwined in My Cafe!

🎪 Take part in festivals and quests
Join a town or create your own and meet its residents! Participate in festivals, fulfill tasks to lead your town to success. Festivals are a great way to earn some gems for your cafe during the weekends, so don't miss out on them.

You will never get bored with our quests! Explore new locations, interact with items using energy, and complete tasks to learn the story. Buy the object you like with the quest currency and make your restaurant even more stylish.

👋 Meet other coffee shop owners
Meet like-minded coffee shop and restaurant owners and get a sneak peek at their business. Use the chat function to interact with other owners. You never know what life longer friendships could develop!

💁‍♀️ Here are some tips for you
● Participate in Bill's trivia questions and receive coins for each correct answer.
● Want more tips? Be sure to have matching decor in your restaurant from the same style option!
● Serve special recipes in your restaurant that customers pay much more for.
But let's not reveal all the tips of My Cafe, join the game and experience it for yourself! You will absolutely love this mix of restaurant management, cooking and tycoon simulation game!
_____

Please note: An internet connection is required to play the game.

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking & restaurant business simulation game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/mycafe.games
descriptionShort: Build your own restaurant, hire staff, serve your customers tasty desserts

title: My Cafe: Restaurant management

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to My Cafe — Restaurant Management ⭐ Cooking Game 🍰.

Have you ever dreamed of opening your own profitable business and becoming a restaurant tycoon? Here everything is possible! My Cafe takes the best from business management and idle tycoon games with a good mix of cooking games.

Enjoy this exciting restaurant tycoon simulator & management game! Cook according to recipes and serve your customers delicious food and coffee, manage your restaurant, and decorate it with various aesthetically pleasing styles to attract more visitors to your cafe, earn profit along with enjoying an exciting storyline.

Intrigued? Let us tell you more about the game's features!

💰Manage restaurant and get profit
Reveal your business and restaurant management skills with My Cafe! Receive visitors in your cozy coffee shop, serve desserts, and earn coins. Use the coins you earn to buy equipment for your cafe and upgrade other items in your coffee shop. Everything is like in real life!

Added bonus: Even when you are not playing the game, the staff will complete orders for you and generate income for your cafe.

☕️ Cook and surprise your customers with delicious recipes
Do you like cooking? Сinnamon cupcakes, french coffee… Sounds tasty! Step by step you will discover new exciting recipes to delight your visitors. Take their orders, cook, and serve them delicious food and drinks.

🛋 Decorate your coffee shop
Show your design skills and decorate your coffee shop to your hearts’ desire with tons of gorgeous decor items to choose from. Pick and match furniture, wall color, and exterior decor to turn your cafe a bucket list visit.

👩‍💼 💬 Interact with your customers
Customers come to your coffee shop not just to eat - but to share interesting stories! Meet visitors and discover their unique life stories, develop true friendships, and share advice.
Love, mystery, relationships... All these and many more stories are intertwined in My Cafe!

🎪 Take part in festivals and quests
Join a town or create your own and meet its residents! Participate in festivals, fulfill tasks to lead your town to success. Festivals are a great way to earn some gems for your cafe during the weekends, so don't miss out on them.

You will never get bored with our quests! Explore new locations, interact with items using energy, and complete tasks to learn the story. Buy the object you like with the quest currency and make your restaurant even more stylish.

👋 Meet other coffee shop owners
Meet like-minded coffee shop and restaurant owners and get a sneak peek at their business. Use the chat function to interact with other owners. You never know what life longer friendships could develop!

💁‍♀️ Here are some tips for you
● Participate in Bill's trivia questions and receive coins for each correct answer.
● Want more tips? Be sure to have matching decor in your restaurant from the same style option!
● Serve special recipes in your restaurant that customers pay much more for.
But let's not reveal all the tips of My Cafe, join the game and experience it for yourself! You will absolutely love this mix of restaurant management, cooking and tycoon simulation game!
_____

Please note: An internet connection is required to play the game.

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking & restaurant business simulation game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/mycafe.games

title: My Cafe: Restaurant management

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Decide on your cafe or restaurant business strategy and earn income, even when you are offline!

RESTAURANT GAME SIMULATION
• With My Cafe you can own and grow a coffee shop or a restaurant of your dreams
• Decorate your coffee shop as you wish, hire and train staff, decide on cafe menu items and even set prices as you see fit

CAFE DECOR
• Do you have a knack for design? Hone your interior design skills!
• In this cooking game, you can choose from numerous decor styles, position furniture as you wish, and make a coffee shop totally yours by accentuating with elements that show your true self

INTERACTIVE STORYLINES IN YOUR CAFE
• As a true coffee shop owner, you will get to meet your customers from various backgrounds and get to help them navigate through life. In this restaurant game you can pick between different lines of dialogue with customers and see where your story takes you!
• Do you like drama? Romance? In My Cafe, the choice is all yours!

GO SOCIAL WITH MY CAFE
• Play my cafe with friends and meet like-minded coffee lovers to compete against owners of other coffee shops
• Fulfill festival tasks and lead your town to success together!

Do you love coffee as much as we do?
• Unleash your barista superpower and create custom coffee and tea drinks for all your guests
• Unlock unique coffee recipes and spice up everyone’s life in your cafe with distinctive coffee drink combinations

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
descriptionShort: We invite you to open a trendy restaurant! Serve food, decorate your coffee shop

title: My Cafe: Restaurant management

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
descriptionShort: Build your own cooking empire, hire staff, serve your customers yummy desserts

appDetails.developerAddress: 105, Agion Omologiton Avenue, 1080 Nicosia, Cyprus
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Friends! In this update:
For players of lvl 8+:
• Waking up as the heir of the countess? Competing against Margaret to win a fortune? Petrovich is in over his head!
• Rumor has it that Max's friend turned into a vampire. And he's gone missing! Max is on the case.
• Nicole's pup has fallen for Her Majesty's royal pooch! Is he barking up the wrong tree, or does he have a shot?
• Royal Season! Earn trophies in festivals and the Goblet will give you more diamonds
See our socials for details.

title: My Cafe: Restaurant management

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Decide on your cafe or restaurant business strategy and earn income, even when you are offline!

RESTAURANT GAME SIMULATION
• With My Cafe you can own and grow a coffee shop or a restaurant of your dreams
• Decorate your coffee shop as you wish, hire and train staff, decide on cafe menu items and even set prices as you see fit

CAFE DECOR
• Do you have a knack for design? Hone your interior design skills!
• In this cooking game, you can choose from numerous decor styles, position furniture as you wish, and make a coffee shop totally yours by accentuating with elements that show your true self

INTERACTIVE STORYLINES IN YOUR CAFE
• As a true coffee shop owner, you will get to meet your customers from various backgrounds and get to help them navigate through life. In this restaurant game you can pick between different lines of dialogue with customers and see where your story takes you!
• Do you like drama? Romance? In My Cafe, the choice is all yours!

GO SOCIAL WITH MY CAFE
• Play my cafe with friends and meet like-minded coffee lovers to compete against owners of other coffee shops
• Fulfill festival tasks and lead your town to success together!

Do you love coffee as much as we do?
• Unleash your barista superpower and create custom coffee and tea drinks for all your guests
• Unlock unique coffee recipes and spice up everyone’s life in your cafe with distinctive coffee drink combinations

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
descriptionShort: We invite you to open a trendy restaurant! Serve food, decorate your coffee shop

appDetails.developerAddress: 105, Agion Omologiton Avenue, 1080 Nicosia, Cyprus
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

• There's an unknown monster in the forest? Nicole and Buster are on the trail!
• Follow the white rabbit around the Wonderhouse with Chloe
• Go on a head-spinning adventure with Diego and his mysterious friend

title: My Cafe — Restaurant Game

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
descriptionShort: Build your own cooking empire, hire staff, serve your customers yummy desserts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Say hello to My Café's task system!

• New progress mechanics: "Unlock recipe," "Buy new furniture," and "Earn coins" are just a few of the tasks that will earn you experience points and new levels
• More rewards! Complete tasks and get valuable resources

title: My Cafe — Restaurant & Cooking

container.value:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS

Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

title: My Cafe — Restaurant & Cooking

container.value:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame

• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

title: My Cafe — Restaurant & Cooking

container.value:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
descriptionShort: Build your own cooking empire, hire staff, serve your customers yummy desserts

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
descriptionShort: Serve cakes, coffee & more in the city in this cooking adventure simulator

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Friends! In this update:
For level 7+ players:
Easter Season! Earn trophies in festivals and collect cool prizes and the Easter Crew decoration
For level 8+ players:
• Only a miracle can save the forest! Make it happen with Andy and Nicole
• Detective Battle! Watson or Henry—who'll win?!
• "Hoot!" said the owl as it handed Cleo a letter… from the Magic School!
• Petrovich stumbled upon a fairytale land, and now he has to save it!
See our socials for deets. Have fun!

WOOHOO! Happy birthday to My Café!
For level 7+ players:
It's Birthday Season! Earn trophies in festivals and collect cool prizes and the Splendid Seven decoration
For level 8+ players:
• Ann and Chloe are holding a Coffee and Cake Tournament! Make desserts, decorate your coffee shop, and have fun with your customers!
• Pegasus is missing! Distinguishing details: likes carrots and intrigue. Look for him with Petrovich, get prizes, and collect the unique decoration
Thank you for amazing 7 years!

title: My Cafe — Restaurant Game

container.value:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:

• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame

Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

Follow My Cafe on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mycafe.games/

• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
descriptionShort: Serve cakes, coffee & more in the city in this cooking adventure simulator

title:
My Cafe — Restaurant Game
2023.11.1.0

container.value:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

Follow My Cafe on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mycafe.games/

Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html?lang=en
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html?lang=en

Questions about the game? Our support is ready and waiting at: https://melsoft-games.helpshift.com/hc/en/3-my-cafe-recipes-stories---world-restaurant-game/contact-us/
descriptionShort: Build your own cooking empire, hire staff, serve your customers yummy desserts

title:
My Cafe — Restaurant & Cooking
2023.12.1.1

container.value:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

Follow My Cafe on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mycafe.games/

Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html?lang=en
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html?lang=en

Questions about the game? Our support is ready and waiting at: https://melsoft-games.helpshift.com/hc/en/3-my-cafe-recipes-stories---world-restaurant-game/contact-us/
descriptionShort: Build your own cooking empire, hire staff, serve your customers yummy desserts

title:
My Cafe — Restaurant & Cooking
2024.1.1.0

container.value:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

Follow My Cafe on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mycafe.games/

Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html?lang=en
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html?lang=en

Questions about the game? Our support is ready and waiting at: https://melsoft-games.helpshift.com/hc/en/3-my-cafe-recipes-stories---world-restaurant-game/contact-us/
descriptionShort: Build your own cooking empire, hire staff, serve your customers yummy desserts

title:
My Cafe — Restaurant Game
2024.4.0.1

container.value:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

Follow My Cafe on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mycafe.games/

Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html?lang=en
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html?lang=en

Questions about the game? Our support is ready and waiting at: https://melsoft-games.helpshift.com/hc/en/3-my-cafe-recipes-stories---world-restaurant-game/contact-us/
descriptionShort: Build your own cooking empire, hire staff, serve your customers yummy desserts
