2024.6.1.0

container.value:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

Follow My Cafe on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mycafe.games/

Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html?lang=en
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html?lang=en
The game contains in-game purchases (including randomized items)

Questions about the game? Our support is ready and waiting at: https://melsoft-games.helpshift.com/hc/en/3-my-cafe-recipes-stories---world-restaurant-game/contact-us/
descriptionShort: Build your own cooking empire, hire staff, serve your customers yummy desserts

appDetails.developerAddress:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Summer, the sea, vacation time, and our beloved My Café!
For level 7+ players:
Ocean Seasons! Earn trophies in festivals and collect cool prizes and medals
For level 15+ players:
Celebrate Independence Day with us—take part in your fave activities, collect the America furniture set, and get cool prizes and gifts!
New York, Space, and School of Magic Merge events—soak up the atmosphere of far-flung travels and adventures!

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

Follow My Cafe on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mycafe.games/

Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html?lang=en
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html?lang=en
The game contains in-game purchases (including randomized items)

Questions about the game? Our support is ready and waiting at: https://melsoft-games.helpshift.com/hc/en/3-my-cafe-recipes-stories---world-restaurant-game/contact-us/
descriptionShort: Build your own cooking empire, hire staff, serve your customers yummy desserts

Turquoise and Ruby seasons! Participate in festivals, earn trophies, and collect cool prizes!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
My Café is celebrating Halloween!

Wow! The Stylish Gift got a spookily awesome Halloween makeover! What could be inside? Seize the moment and decorate your coffee shop for the occasion!

We've got devilishly cute gifts and surprises for you—take part in your fave activities to collect pumpkins and sugar skulls to exchange for Halloween chests, furniture, medals, and much more!

Introducing the soul-chilling Halloween Party Merge—don't forget to don your scariest costume!

title:
My Cafe — Restaurant & Cooking
2024.10.1.1

container.value:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

Follow My Cafe on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mycafe.games/

Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html?lang=en
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html?lang=en
The game contains in-game purchases (including randomized items)

Questions about the game? Our support is ready and waiting at: https://melsoft-games.helpshift.com/hc/en/3-my-cafe-recipes-stories---world-restaurant-game/contact-us/
descriptionShort: Build your own cooking empire, hire staff, serve your customers yummy desserts

Seasons of awesome shopping—super bonuses, super prizes, and super rewards for your favorite activities! Be the fastest and assemble a collection of new chests, incredible avatars, and medals

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
descriptionShort: Run your dream cafe and cook up a storm in this ultimate restaurant simulator!

appDetails.developerAddress:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Love is in the air at My Café!

Get ready for the most romantic seasons of the year! Earn trophies in festivals to claim cool prizes as well as floral and cat-tastic crystal balls!

Winter Kingdom Merge—you're officially invited to the coronation! Address: A Land Far Away, Fairytale Troll Forest, Icy Castle.

You're in the finest Parisian restaurant, your soulmate is down on one knee, and your heart has never been so full! It's the perfect proposal in Confession of Love Merge!

appDetails.developerAddress:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Spring has sprung at My Café, and it's brought good fortune along for good measure!

New St. Patrick's Day seasons are coming up, and the leprechauns have already stashed away chests of rewards. Earn trophies in festivals and claim stunning medals and lucky crystal balls.

Enjoy sunny days and fragrant seasonal flowers with the Spring Adventures collection.

Leprechaun Trail Merge: head out on a journey to try spring treats and unveil the secret of luck.

7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It's time for a vibrant Easter at My Café!

Bunnies are rushing around, neighbors are decorating eggs, and the scent of flowers is in the air... Mother Nature is ready to wake up, just like our soft spring seasons! Earn trophies in festivals and claim a whole basket of prizes as well as crystal balls with mischievous furry friends!

It's like the seasonal Soft April furniture was made with the essence of spring itself! So don't delay, update your interior and invite your friends!

It's like the seasonal Soft April furniture was made with the essence of spring itself! So don't delay, update your interior and invite your friends!

title:
My Cafe — Restaurant & Cooking
2025.4.0.3

container.value:
7 Mikve Israel Street,
PO Box 627, Tel Aviv, Israel

creator: Melsoft Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Love coffee and fun? You’re in the right place. Step into My Cafe and embark on your very own restaurant story game.

Build your cafe from the ground up and transform it into a 5* restaurant that will be the talk of city. Expand your MyCafe empire and show the cooking game world what success really looks like. Ready? Let’s go!

What’s inside this exciting cooking games adventure?

PLAY A REALISTIC CAFE SIMULATOR
• In this coffee game simulator, use your entrepreneurial skills to grow your cafe business. Fill the fridge with goodies, make coffee, expand the menu and level up your kitchen game.
• Manage your restaurant and team to dominate the cooking simulator game universe. Pour delicious coffee, add new items, and cook unbelievable meals to satisfy your customers.
• Become the cooking master, and turn a simple cafeteria into an award-winning restaurant with crazy-good cooking.
• Waiter games are GO! In this cooking adventure, you’ll need to hire the professionals. From waiting staff to baristas to a cooking organizer, with a team like this, there’s no way you can’t win the restaurant games challenge.

STYLE YOUR CAFE WITH DECOR
• Unlock your inner restaurant games designer and turn that cooking mama cafe into a chic cafe.
• In this restaurant game, there are no limits to your creativity. Choose from tons of decor styles, position furniture, and make that humble little coffee shop your own.
• Whether you’re leveling up your burger game or rocking your street food to restaurant adventure—there’s something for everyone here.

DISCOVER INTERACTIVE CAFE GAME STORYLINES
• It’s never boring in this cooking simulator adventure. From playing kitchen games to staying on top of big cooking trends to serving games and more, you’ll be rushed off your feet and have lots of fun, too!
• Learn all about coffee town’s characters and your potential customers. Find out their favorite orders and level up your drinks and snacks menu with tasty treats and unique coffee recipes. Serve coffee and desserts to all members of the community, from the local librarian to a grade-school teacher and even a police officer. Get their orders right and you’ll have happy customers for life.
• Drama? Romance? MyCafe has it all. In the cafe world, you’ll go on a cooking voyage like no other. Who knows, you might even meet your cooking crush.
• The choice is yours. This is your cooking story. Choose your path through the My Cafe simulation game and unlock an unmissable diner games adventure.

GO SOCIAL AND PLAY COFFEE GAMES WITH FRIENDS
• Like to go it alone? That’s cool. But if you like your coffee social, this coffee shop game has something special for you. Play the My Cafe restaurant game with new friends and old ones to have even more fun. Compete against owners of other coffee shops in cooking mania challenges to take the prize of top barista in the food game planet.
• Visit festivals, complete tasks, expand your coffee empire, and have fun together!

Calling all coffee lovers!
It’s time to unlock your barista superpowers and create custom coffee in this cafe story adventure game.
So, go ahead and make yourself a cup of coffee and let’s play My Cafe together!

Follow My Cafe on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mycafe.games/

Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html?lang=en
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html?lang=en
The game contains in-game purchases (including randomized items)

Questions about the game? Our support is ready and waiting at: https://melsoft-games.helpshift.com/hc/en/3-my-cafe-recipes-stories---world-restaurant-game/contact-us/
descriptionShort: Build your own cooking empire, hire staff, serve your customers yummy desserts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
My Café is nine years old!

Time to get out the party hats and firecrackers—awaiting you in the new seasons are flowers, birthday wishes, special gifts, and crystal balls with sweet treats inside!

Where can you find the most popular sort of coffee? In Brazil Merge, of course! Jet off to the land of jungle flora, watch the local birds, play soccer, and dance to the samba rhythms at carnival!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
A heatwave has hit My Café! Time to set off on a dream vacation!

Our new seasons include the ease of origami and the vibrant colors of a Mexican carnival. Earn trophies, colorful medals, and bright furniture, play hot melodies, and enjoy exotic crystal balls!

Remember your favorite fairy tale in the Puppet Story Merge! Save the gold key, immerse yourself in a circus atmosphere, and set off on an adventure alongside a wooden boy and his friends.
